LightningComponentBundle.description: Unified component for selecting Locations, Vendors, or Clients. Replaces LocationContainer, VendorContainer, and ClientContainer with a single configurable component. Features multi-field search, recent entities, and inline detail display.

property.name: mode
property.label: Mode
property.description: Entity type mode: location, vendor, or client. Leave blank to allow user selection.

property.name: showRecentEntities
property.label: Show Recent Entities
property.description: Show recent entities for quick selection

property.name: recentEntityLimit
property.label: Recent Entity Limit
property.description: Number of recent entities to show
